about.title: Teaching Staff
about.description: The faculty of R K International School (RKIS) gives a special touch to the holistic and well-rounded education that each student is promised here. An educator not only facilitates a student in developing interest and understanding a subject, but also functions, at the same time, as a mentor to them. The faculty of RKIS consists of 100 full-time highly qualified teachers, who have extensive teaching experience in their respective fields. Every deucator imbibes the culture and ethos that is the thread, which unites the entire teaching fraternity of RKIS. This academic community, not only shares knowledge through the regular teaching sessions, but also engages students in a rich and varied extracurricular activities programs â€“ be it hobbies, clubs, educational trips or excursions, social service or student exchange to various countries.

members.name: Ms. Nidhi Nehra
members.description: Childhood is a state of mind which ends the moment a puddle is first viewed as an obstacle instead of an opportunity. The most significant phase of human life, childhood, is known for its naivety, innocence and simplicity. Neuroscience states that neurons are highly active between 0 to 8 years of age, thus resulting in formation of habits, acquiring moral values and etiquette and developing concepts for a lifetime. Therefore real education needs to be imparted in these years so that the roots are strong enough to bring up an intellectual youth having good habits, values and etiquette. Schooling at this age needs to be very effective in instilling moral values of honesty, integrity and truthfulness along with self confidence and self esteem. From kindergarten, we have been laying the foundation and have seen our students passing out in XII as confident responsible adults ready to face challenges in their lives. Holistic education is the need of the hour to build a strong nation of youth equally strong in body mind and soul. We at Indus have been pursuing our modest endeavors to contribute in producing a new generation of adults physically strong, mentally balanced and emotionally stable. With the blessings of the Almighty, and good wishes of our well wishers we hope to continue successfully treading the path of Craftsmanship in generating noble citizens of the Nation.

members.name: Mr. Vishav Raj Rattan
members.description: Myself Vishav Raj Rattan, and I currently hold the esteemed position of Senior Academic Coordinator. In my role, I serve as a key pillar of support and leadership within the academic department of our institution. As a Senior Academic Coordinator, my primary responsibilities revolve around ensuring the seamless operation of various academic programs and initiatives. I play a pivotal role in coordinating and overseeing the execution of educational activities, from curriculum planning to student assessment and everything in between. One of the most rewarding aspects of my role is working closely with a talented team of educators and administrators to enhance the overall learning experience for our students. Collaborating with faculty members, I contribute to the development of innovative teaching methods and curriculum enhancements that keep our institution at the forefront of education. Additionally, I take pride in fostering a supportive and inclusive learning environment for our students. Whether it's addressing their academic needs, providing guidance on career paths, or organizing extracurricular activities, I am dedicated to ensuring that our students receive a holistic education that prepares them for success in their future endeavors. Furthermore, I am responsible for monitoring and evaluating the performance of academic programs, identifying areas for improvement, and implementing strategies to enhance the quality of education we offer. This involves conducting regular assessments and gathering feedback from students and faculty to continuously refine our educational offerings. In essence, my role as Senior Academic Coordinator is not only about managing the academic operations but also about nurturing a culture of excellence and lifelong learning within our institution. I am committed to empowering students and faculty alike to reach their highest potential and contribute meaningfully to society. In summary, as Senior Academic Coordinator, I am privileged to be part of a dynamic academic community, working tirelessly to shape the future of education and empower individuals to achieve their academic and professional goals.

members.name: Ms. Renu Kukreja
members.description: Ms. Renu Kukreja is MBA, B.Ed and also certified in Office Management Course. She has 3 years of experience in Admin Department and also has 8 years of teaching experience. Being junior coordinator, she strongly believes in team spirit to achieve the set organizational goals, ethos and philosophy for the holistic development of the students. She is involved in setting appropriate standards and benchmarks in curriculum areas, analysing, preparing and presenting data to demonstrate achievements of cohorts in test and tasks, and learnings. She is also involved in developing a responsive and appropriate curriculum which is child centered to cater the need of the hour. The focus of an activity based curriculum is teaching skills and knowledge to your students through creative tasks and activities. Rather than students passively listening to a teacher, students will complete tasks that practise key skills and allow them to absorb information in an active way. At R K International School, education is not restricted to mere textbooks, but is a complete package aimed at holistic learning resulting in complete evolution of the body mind and soul. Real education provides the confidence and courage to face the challenges in life. It's about teaching the child How to think rather than What to think. Equipping the child with adequate life skills, knowledge and wisdom to sustain himself or herself in the tough world. Activity-based learning is indulging students in activities by stimulating their senses, such as sight, smell, vision or feeling, and getting them involved in the subject. We at R K International School organizes many class activities and competitions time to time, to explore the hidden talent of the students. We provide every possibility to expose our students at different platforms in and out of the school so that our students get the every possible opportunity to develop their personality to enable them survive in this competitive world. Our staff is well-learned and provide simulative environment promoting personalized and activity-based learning.

members.name: Dr. Vishav Raj Rattan
members.description: 'Bloom's Taxonomy' parameters which develop the children to think and understand. I personally feel it is important for students. One has to develop the attitude of developing questions like 'Why' and 'How' to encourage his own learning skills. If the 'Concepts' are strong , your subject knowledge, critical, creative thinking is strong. Now if you ask me what we have achieved from these exams? Exams develop them as an individual, give values, extraordinary thinking, self assessment, overcome failures, filling them with positivity to improve the quality of education. Examinations don't mean creating a feeling of depression among students. Exams are intended to develop a sense of responsibility among those learners to remember the concepts and present them in the most valuable form. I personally believe that if the process of examination is made effective tool of assessing the real growth of the child then it can give us a more comprehensive report of the child signifying his/her mental and cognitive development. If all the students consider exams as a routine test with positive benefits, it will help them improve their self & increase their knowledge.

members.name: Ms. Asha Dalal
members.description: Ms. Asha Dalal is PGT English & English Language Ambassador of our School. She is working with us since 2017 and her journey is phenomenal so far. She is always ready to take new assignments in her hands whenever called upon so. She organize various activities like spell bee, Vocabulary Activity, Rally, debate, declamation, Elocution, Activities related Spoken English etc. She is very popular among students due to her calm personality and polite behavior. She believes in creating change by creating mass awareness in an polite manner.

head.name: Ms. Dayawati
head.description: Ms. Dayawati holds the esteemed position of Head of Department for the Hindi department at R K International School. With her extensive experience and deep passion for the Hindi language and literature, she plays a pivotal role in shaping the academic landscape of the school. In her capacity as the Head of Department, Ms. Dayawati demonstrates exceptional leadership and expertise. She is responsible for overseeing the Hindi curriculum, ensuring its alignment with educational standards, and continually enhancing it to foster a deep appreciation for the language among students. Ms. Dayawati's commitment to educational excellence is evident in her dedication to promoting innovative teaching methods and creating a stimulating learning environment. She works closely with her team of educators to inspire a love for Hindi literature and language, helping students develop strong linguistic skills and a profound understanding of the cultural significance of Hindi. With her profound knowledge of Hindi and her unwavering dedication to the Hindi department at R K International School, Ms. Dayawati is instrumental in nurturing a generation of students who are not only proficient in the language but also deeply connected to its rich cultural heritage. Her contributions continue to make a significant impact on the academic and cultural fabric of the school.

featured_teacher.name: Ms. Prabha
featured_teacher.description: Ms. Prabha is a highly qualified teacher with M.A. & Bachelor of Education. With a vast experience of 30 years in teaching and has been working with us since 11 years, she loves disseminating knowledge to connect the new generation with our roots, i.e. Indian culture. He fancies exploring Indian culture and listening to devotional songs. Children adore her for her story sessions based on Indian mythology in morning assemblies. She trains the students in Sanskrit shlok Vadan & prepare them for various intra and inter- school competitions.

head.name: Mr. Vinay Kumar(Post Graduate & B.Ed.)
head.description: Mr. Vinay Sachdeva loves teaching as he gets to witness what he calls the "AHA!" moment when students are able to think critically, question the status quo and respond positively to society's needs. He is a dynamic and well-organised professional with nearly 09 years of rich experience of teaching English, with five years at RKIS. With He has conducted many workshops on Vocabulary Enrichment and Phonetics. Many of his students have excelled and added many feathers in their caps in the fields of academic, drama, debates, storytelling, Mime at Inter-School levels. He has a knack for enhancing student learning by optimising wide range of innovative classroom activities and maintaining positive relationships with students, parents, community members and staff.

head.name: Ms. Poonam Dahiya
head.description: Ms Poonam Dahiya is a passionate Science teacher with Master's in Technology ( Electronics & communication) and Bachelor's Degree in Education . She has also worked as a lecturer in IITB College, Jhundpur. With more than nine years of teaching experience, she has been serving RKIS for the last six years. She endeavours to simplify scientific concepts to foster a love for the subject in her students. She wishes her students to be scientifically informed, caring, and responsible individuals who can think critically and make the right choices for themselves, environment and society. With a keen desire to make science enjoyable and application based she focuses on strengthening of core concepts. Constantly up skilling herself and reading remain her abiding pursuits.

members.name: Mr. Rohit Puri
members.description: Mr. Rohit Puri is M.Com, B.Ed and has been working in this line from the last 14 years and have a sound command over his subjects. He joined R K International School in 2021 and it's been a wonderful journey since then. He is always ready to work for the betterment of child's future and in the same context he usually take counseling sessions for grade XI & XII students for their career planning. He is popular among students for his cooperative & guiding nature.

members.name: Mr. Subash Chand
members.description: Mr. subash chand is M. Com and B.ed. He has been working in R K International School as PGT Economics from last two years and his total teaching experience is 14 years. He is well confident in his subject. He guides the students in very polite manner and usually organize doubt session regarding the subject and career.

head.name: Ms. Promila
head.description: As the Maths HOD, Promila understands the importance of fostering a growth mindset among our students. She firmly believes that every student can excel in Mathematics with the right guidance, support, and motivation. By nurturing a positive learning environment, She instill confidence and encourage students to embrace challenges, persist in problem-solving, and celebrate their successes.

head.name: Ms. Pinki Hooda
head.description: A passionate facilitator of History and Social Sciences, she promotes an environment of erudite discussions and debates. With 17 years of teaching experience, she has been serving RKIS for the last 7 years. She has been instrumental in organizing MUN. It is her firm belief that for a comprehensive assimilation of the subject the students should understand the interrelation of incidents in History and relate them to the present experience. As a facilitator, she believes that her work can only be justified if her students are able to remember her for her contribution in shaping their lives.

head.name: Shivani Garg
head.description: The best programs are written so that computing machines can perform them quickly and so that human beings can understand them clearly. Ms. Shivani Garg is a Post Graduate Teacher at RKIS. She has an experience of 3 years. She is popular among students because of her friendly nature which make students comfortable in her company.

members.name: Ms. Renu Kukreja
members.description: The focus of an activity based curriculum is teaching skills and knowledge to your students through creative tasks and activities. Rather than students passively listening to a teacher, students will complete tasks that practice key skills and allow them to absorb information in an active way. members.name: Mr. Sagar Kapoor
members.description: Mr. Sagar Kapoor has done B.A. Honors in Musical Vocal from Delhi University. He has also done Sangeet Prabhakar in Hindustani Shashtriya Sangeet from Pryaag Sangeet Samiti, IllAhabad. He has also given performances of Sufi songs in Hungarian Embassy, National School of Drama, British Embassy, Sangeet Natak Academy Jaipur. He has also participated in Sa Re Ga Ma Pa Musical Tour in USA for the period of two and half months. He is also the winner of Radio reality singing show UDAAN 2022. He has worked in Rotary Club Delhi.

members.name: Mr. Ankit
members.description: Mr. Ankit is a versatile dancer who has potential to make audience dance at their feet with him. He scored 1st prize in BREEZER VIVID SHUFFLE judged by VARUN DHAWAN, 3rd Position in INDIAN HIPHOP DANCE CHAMPIONSHIP. 1st Position in DANCE DREAM LAND judged by SURESH MUKUND(Choreographer of KING UNITED), 5th Position in DESTINY 2.0 judged by MIKEY DELLAVELLA.

members.name: Ms. Seema Devi
members.description: Ms. Seema Devi is Master's in Fine Arts, Certified in arts and craft. She has a total experience of 11 years. She is phenomenal in her skills and very creative. She is very resourceful as she knows very well the best way to use waste and discarded materials. She always surprises the audience when they come to know the materials used in the article. She is very good in motivating the students in creativity. Students really enjoy her slots and come out with the artists hidden in them.

head.name: Mr. Ajit Singh Rathee
head.designation: Head of Department, Sports and Physical Education
head.description: Mr. Ajit holds a Master degree in Physical Education and has an experience more than 5 years. He is also a certified coach of football. He believes in "The hardest skill to acquire in this sport is the one where you compete all out, give it all you have, and you are still getting beat no matter what you do. When you have the killer instinct to fight through that, it is very special." He has represented and clinched many position in various district and state level football championships. He has also many achievements as a coach and many players got selected for various state level football championships. He also holds a certificate course of Coaching Athletics from International Association of Physical Education. He is also the topper of batch of six week certificate course in coaching football at National Boxing Academy, Rohtak 2019. He has also completed a Referee Course IN Football from Haryana Football Association (Referee Identification Number 550945 from AIFF). The academic performance of students in Physical Education has been outstanding under his supervision. Mr. Ajit hopes to see his students excel in every aspect and represent Hockey and their school at International platforms.

members.name: Ms. Renuka
members.description: Ms. Renuka Verma BA, Bed, working as a PRT Hindi in RK International School. She has 20 years of experience as a PRT in R K I S and feels proud to be a part of R K International School. For her, teaching isn't all about learning ABC's and 123's. It's about building confidence in students to help them with the drive to succeed. She opts this passion because she has love for sharing knowledge and she wants to achieve confidence, self-worth, and a love of learning.

members.name: Ms. Gayatri Kaushal
members.description: Ms. Gayatri Kaushal BA, Bed, working as a PRT in Rk International School from the last 7 years. She has 17 years of experience as a PRT teacher. She believes that Education is not preparation for life; education is life itself. She chooss this profession as teaching is her life's passion because her years of experience as a teacher has helped her form a teaching philosophy that guides how she helps her students succeed in the classroom and beyond. And from last 7 years she has been with this organisation.
